sentences.sContent: Nowadays because there is more and more unhealthy food and venenous material in our food, people drive to pay more attention to their health.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nowadays because there is more and more unhealthy food and venenous material in our food, people drive to pay more attention to their health.
sentences.sCn: 如今因为市面上有越来越多的垃圾食品和有毒食品，迫使人们更加关注自己的健康。

sentences.sContent: Conclusions Flutamide can cut down the secretory volume of T to block the sexual differentiation and development by the venenous harm on cellular organ and the restrained activity of key enzyme.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conclusions Flutamide can cut down the secretory volume of T to block the sexual differentiation and development by the venenous harm on cellular organ and the restrained activity of key enzyme.
sentences.sCn: 结论氟他胺通过对生成睾酮细胞器的毒性损害和关键酶的抑制，降低了睾酮的分泌量，从而阻碍了性分化和性发育。
